page.title: 04DENHOLM
page.content: Denholm is between Hawick and Jedburgh.There are about 600 people in the village.Most of the the houses are around the village green.In the middle of the green there is a monument commemorating John Leyden,Denholm's famous poet.There are some shops in Denholm 2 grocers a post office a hair dresser and a saddler.There is one construction firm in Denholm which builds and renovates houses.A sawmill is going to be built on the road to Jedburgh.Workers have planted trees so you will not be able to see it from the road.There are also intresting houses in the village for example the Text House and Leydens Cottage.The Text House is called this because it strange texts on the front of it.There are also entertainments for instance Guides,Brownies,Beavers,Cubs and scouts- TURN TO PAGE FIVE
